description: At the moment it's not possible to remove an existing network with bin/nova-manage. Please implement the missing function in bin/nova-manage.
title: add functionality to bin/nova-manage to remove existing networks

comments.content: At the moment it's not possible to remove an existing network with bin/nova-manage. Please implement the missing function in bin/nova-manage.
